text:
Senior Front End Web Developer | Calendly | Atlanta or Remote | https://calendly.com

Calendly makes life easy for business professionals and their customers by streamlining appointment scheduling through simple, beautiful software.

Apply Here: https://calendly.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk06zd3?referer=hacke...

Experience with JavaScript frameworks (Backbone, Angular, Ember, React) and testing tools (Mocha, Jasmine) Experience in cross-browser compatibility Understanding of CSS3 styling approaches Fully leverage SCSS and/or SASS Expertise in responsive design and understanding of design patterns
